CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Contract Signed stage positioned above or below the Needs Analysis stage?
SRP.A: The Contract Signed stage is positioned {below} the Needs Analysis stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Contract Signed?
VE.A: The value of stage Contract Signed is {144}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Proposal Sent?
VE.A: The value of stage Proposal Sent is {360}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Client Onboarded?
VE.A: The value of stage Client Onboarded is {128}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Needs Analysis, with a value of {634}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Client Onboarded, with a value of {128}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Contract Signed to stage Client Onboarded?
SC.A: Decreased by {16} Clients from stage Contract Signed to stage Client Onboarded.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed?
SC.A: Decreased by {57} Clients from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 172? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Needs Analysis} stage has {634}, the {Proposal Sent} stage has {360}, the {Negotiation} stage has {201}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 280? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {201}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {144}, the {Client Onboarded} stage has {128}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 136 and 497? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Proposal Sent} stage has {360}, the {Negotiation} stage has {201}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {144}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Client Onboarded, or from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Proposal Sent} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, or from stage Contract Signed to Client Onboarded?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to stage {Proposal Sent} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Needs Analysis} and {Proposal Sent} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Client Onboarded} stages.
